subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Mesut Özil, who has quickly become the focal point of Arsenal’s offense, scored one goal and helped set up the other as his club beat Napoli, 2-0, in the Champions League.
snippet: Mesut Özil, who has quickly become the focal point of Arsenal’s offense, scored one goal and helped set up the other as his club beat Napoli, 2-0, in the Champions League.
